::home

::printx | "" --

= Table of the main specifiers : =

|| *Specifier* || *Result* ||
|| %b || Binary ||
|| %s || String ||
|| %d || Decimal ||
|| %% || % ||
|| %f || fixed-point ||
|| %h || hexadecimal ||
|| %i || integer part of fixed-point ||
|| %j || decimal part of fixed-point ||
|| %k || Character ||
|| %o || octal ||
